website_summaries.verdict: This wax comb from Sticky Bumps is a classic design and an inexpensive option, and most importantly, it will get the job done.
pros: Simple wax comb and board wax holder combo
Great for storing wax in your car
cons: The wax comb does a decent job, but there are sturdier options available

customer_reviews.title: The Cheapest of the cheap
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to criticize this because in reality the picture represents it pretty well. Having said that if you haven't actually held it in your hands and you only have pictures to go by it's likely you'll think this is better quality than it is, as I did. It is SUPER CHEAP quality! It seems like something you'd get with tickets from your kids favorite family dining arcade. I'm frankly rather surprised that Sticky Bumps allowed their name to be put on this! I have already wasted more time than this thing is worth, ordering it, walking to the hub to pick it up, and now reviewing it. You've been warned!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: OMG I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this thing. In Cali it got up to over 100+F last week. I mistakenly left my wax bag in the car. This little box contained the melt within the box. The comb is not robust like some of the ones that come with the surf shorts but it works. It is strong enough to ruffle the wax so I can surf without putting more wax and I actually removed the entire wax job from 2 of my boards recently with it. It did the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Parilli

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Dude, the box is wicked flimsy and not large enough to accommodate sticky bumps wax. I had to break the piece apart and cram them in. Lost my zogs box and needed a replacement, definitely going to scour eBay and find it again because this box won’t last the summer. Great in a pinch though and I actually kind of like the comb, but the other review was right. The combs that came with my Leash and board shorts are much more robust.
customer_reviews.author: Mtchcnnr

customer_reviews.title: consistent quaity
customer_reviews.text: Great comb, great box, great wax. This brand has been around for years and is trusted by surfers around the world for a very good reason.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: Wax doesn’t fit in box
customer_reviews.text: If this was made by sticky bumps, you would think they would make the box big enough to fit a new bar of sticky bumps wax in there. Full Wax bars don’t fit and I hate breaking the bars in half. Pretty annoying but I’ll keep it anyway
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good comb, bad box design
customer_reviews.text: The comb is great, but the wax box is not so good. The cover gets pushed inside the box if not closed "carefully". There are only a few very small plastic tabs that lock it in, my first thought was "oh boy, this won't last long". And the box is very hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto R.

customer_reviews.title: Skip it.
customer_reviews.text: For 6 bucks I expected a hard plastic case that would be durable. Instead I got a cheap flimsy plastic case that will for sure break within a month.
customer_reviews.author: sj0rgensen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Storing Wax
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing tropical wax in my car. The comb's teeth are a little far apart, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great container for your bar of soap. Comb, not so great for head lice.
customer_reviews.author: CarlosC

customer_reviews.title: box holds wax
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It's fits a bar of sticky bumps perfectly and keeps wax from getting everywhere. The comb teeth are a little long and the box will probably break at some point (either from overuse or me dropping heavy things on it) but honestly its 6 bucks for a box and comb
customer_reviews.author: Krateo heroditus

customer_reviews.title: awesome, I had to order a second
customer_reviews.text: awesome, I had to order a second. Super convenient to have a place for wax with a wax comb, fits sticky bumps wax like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Lito

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: First I requested a blue box and got a yellow one. Second, upon receipt the lid was smashed into the box and now does not close. I tried to request a return and am told it is not eligible for return. Don’t waste your time!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tavajian

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: The case is pretty thin plastic and cheap clasp mechanism. I don't think it will survive being shuffled around in my wetsuit tub for long. But it was an add-on item so I could get my order total above the minimum for free shipping. The wax comb seems decent enough though.
customer_reviews.author: Major Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Missing item
customer_reviews.text: Received the box in 3 days, yaaaa. However I ordered 2 and they only went 1 comb. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall, the comb worked great to clean off all the old wax from my board. Only issue was the box only holds half a bar of wax not a whole one.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: It's cool and it will work I just wish it would hold a new bar comfortably. of course that issue is gone on the first time you use the wax. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Pablo obeso

customer_reviews.title: Ouchies!
customer_reviews.text: Comb side makes it difficult to remove the wax. Used a rag to cover while scrapping, but would go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Infamousbb48

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta have a comb and don't need it for my Head!!
customer_reviews.author: Kboy24

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to save my wax after I open it so it doesn't get on my car.
customer_reviews.author: ingsurfnpb

customer_reviews.title: wax box
customer_reviews.text: I love these boxes. Perfect for the truck/car. My wax is always ready and never melted
customer_reviews.author: kaleo s andersen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kool wax case with wax comb helps keep the wax from getting on everything
customer_reviews.author: Larry Harlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice cheap, works. Mine came in clear when I asked for blue but whatever
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I just got one empty blue box. Not even the comb or wax on the picture. I want a dam refund or the product. I wasted my time waiting for this shhhtt!
customer_reviews.author: Senen Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The comb did such a great job on the first use! Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Fried

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap deal
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap deal, should pay a little more and buy the better ones or one from your local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: gntlmn5

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a wax comb
customer_reviews.text: Best value for a wax comb, because you're getting the box too. This product was cheaper than most wax combs alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: Just upset I received the wrong color, not worth the return process. Product is decent.
customer_reviews.author: koalaty gamer

customer_reviews.title: Great Comb
customer_reviews.text: Great comb for the price. Does exactly what it should.
customer_reviews.author: M. Press

customer_reviews.title: Missing comb!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present and arrived missing the wax comb , only the stupid plastic box that looked exactly like a travel soap box !
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

product_meta.title: Sticky Bumps Surfboard Wax Box and Comb Kit, Color may vary
product_meta.description: Keep your wax clean and neat with the Sticky Bumps wax box/comb combo. The box holds 1 bar of wax and 1 wax comb. Keep your wax from getting on your car or in the sand.
feature_bullets: Stores 1 Bar Of Wax And 1 Wax Comb
Keep Your Wax From Getting On Your Car Or In The Sand

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
